definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (on orig. form cf. Lag:BN 77; conj. as to meaning Bu:Urgesch. 102, 129);—´[[ל]] Ge 4:19 + 7 t.; [[לָָמֶךְ]] Ge 4:18 + 2 t.;—
son of [[מְתוּשָׁאֵל]] (Cainite) Ge 4:18, Ge 4:19, Ge 4:23, Ge 4:23, Ge 4:24 (all J).
son of [[מְתוּשֶׁלַח]] (Sethite) Ge 5:25, Ge 5:26, Ge 5:28, Ge 5:30, Ge 5:31 (all P), 1Ch 1:3.—LXX Aamex.
